name: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, terminal-themed portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring golden ratio layout and smooth animations.

name: Real-time Chat Application
description: A real-time messaging application with socket.io, featuring private rooms, user authentication, and message history.

name: E-commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce platform with payment integration, admin dashboard, and inventory management.

name: Task Management System
description: A collaborative task management tool with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time updates, and team collaboration features.
